mapper.sql: id as id, expert_name as expertName, expert_photo_url as expertPhotoUrl, expert_intro as expertIntro, expert_phone as expertPhone, server_cases as serverCases, area_id as areaId, expert_domain as expertDomain, expert_profile as expertProfile, best_expert as bestExpert, is_checked as isChecked, create_date as createDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_expert_info ( expert_name, expert_photo_url, expert_intro, expert_phone, server_cases, area_id, expert_domain, expert_profile, best_expert, is_checked, create_date ) VALUES ( #{expertName}, #{expertPhotoUrl}, #{expertIntro}, #{expertPhone}, #{serverCases}, #{areaId}, #{expertDomain}, #{expertProfile}, #{bestExpert}, #{isChecked}, #{createDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_expert_info
expert_name = #{expertName},
expert_photo_url = #{expertPhotoUrl},
expert_intro = #{expertIntro},
expert_phone = #{expertPhone},
server_cases = #{serverCases},
area_id = #{areaId},
expert_domain = #{expertDomain},
expert_profile = #{expertProfile},
best_expert = #{bestExpert},
is_checked = #{isChecked},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_expert_info
expert_name = #{map.expertName},
expert_photo_url = #{map.expertPhotoUrl},
expert_intro = #{map.expertIntro},
expert_phone = #{map.expertPhone},
server_cases = #{map.serverCases},
area_id = #{map.areaId},
expert_domain = #{map.expertDomain},
expert_profile = #{map.expertProfile},
best_expert = #{map.bestExpert},
is_checked = #{map.isChecked},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_expert_info ( expert_name, expert_photo_url, expert_intro, expert_phone, server_cases, area_id, expert_domain, expert_profile, best_expert, is_checked, create_date ) VALUES ( #{map.expertName}, #{map.expertPhotoUrl}, #{map.expertIntro}, #{map.expertPhone}, #{map.serverCases}, #{map.areaId}, #{map.expertDomain}, #{map.expertProfile}, #{map.bestExpert}, #{map.isChecked}, #{map.createDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_expert_info
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND expert_name like CONCAT('%', #{expertName} , '%')
AND expert_photo_url like CONCAT('%', #{expertPhotoUrl} , '%')
AND expert_intro like CONCAT('%', #{expertIntro} , '%')
AND expert_phone like CONCAT('%', #{expertPhone} , '%')
AND server_cases like CONCAT('%', #{serverCases} , '%')
AND area_id like CONCAT('%', #{areaId} , '%')
AND expert_domain like CONCAT('%', #{expertDomain} , '%')
AND expert_profile like CONCAT('%', #{expertProfile} , '%')
AND best_expert like CONCAT('%', #{bestExpert} , '%')
AND is_checked like CONCAT('%', #{isChecked} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
